text: An la she ge biyu: Yige chengshi [mai jia] yuan shi anquan de, shi feichang manzu de, fengfu de jiyang [shangpin] cong ge fang yun lai, dan ta [mai jia de jumin] gufule an la de enhui [zhu], yinci, an la yin tamen suo zuo de e xing [fouren mu sheng deng] shi tamen changshile hanjian de jihuang he kongju.
